meanings.definition: The quality or state of being awkward or clumsy in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her gawkiness was evident as she tripped over her own feet.
meanings.sent2: His gawkiness made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: Despite her gawkiness, she always managed to make people smile.
meanings.sent4: The gawkiness of the newborn foal was endearing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The gawkiness of the teenager was a reminder of the awkwardness of youth.

meanings.sent1: The new student's gawkiness was noticeable as he bumped into desks.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about her gawkiness in social situations.
meanings.sent3: His gawkiness at dancing made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gawkiness of the comedian added to his charm on stage.
meanings.sent5: The gawkiness of the waiter resulted in a few spilled drinks.
